nodes.text: Lori Beck was the production coordinator on the second installment in the Dark Forces Saga, Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II. Another Star Wars title she had worked on was Star Wars: Masters of Teräs Käsi where she also worked as the production coordinator. Lori's work is not limited to Star Wars and ranges to other Lucasarts titles such as Mortimer and the Riddles of the Medallion, Full Throttle, Maniac Mansion: Day of the Tentacle and Sam & Max Hit the Road.
